mapper.insert: insert into todo(id,content,type,status,priority,inserttime,operatetime,finishtime,starttime) values (#{todo.id}, #{todo.content}, #{todo.type}, '0', #{todo.priority}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), null, null,null)
mapper.update: update todo set status='0',finishtime=null where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from todo where status='1' order by finishtime desc
